GAS PAINS

THE STORY
Earlier this week, a major oil pipeline that runs through Alabama 
http://click=2Emorning7=2Etheskimm=2Ecom/?qs=3D13e1958399f015180ed06f7e37bd=
36a28c9824956812295ae4df7646f389759b34dfd2fda72017a9 
exploded =2E
WAIT…BACK UP=2E
The Colonial Pipeline is a system of pipes thousands of miles long that car=
ries millions of barrels of gas, diesel, and jet fuel aday from Texas to Ne=
w Jersey=2E It supplies about a third of the East Coast's gas=2E So it's a =
BF gassy D=2E But the pipeline's run into some problems lately=2E Earlier t=
his fall, part of it was 
http://click=2Emorning7=2Etheskimm=2Ecom/?qs=3D13e1958399f01518813c5513accd=
483e8db374227aa0e48b9f59b7e9d29b9b6525b209d347dd27b5 
shut down  for over a week after a leak in Alabama spilled hundreds of thou=
sands of gallons of gas=2E Cue a 
http://click=2Emorning7=2Etheskimm=2Ecom/?qs=3D13e1958399f015185f16c50280b9=
de78bd24094b4015e8630991b8156c7bcd4cb37b39824eefd5b3 
gas shortage  and prices in southern states going up, up, up=2E
SO WHAT'S THE LATEST?
On Monday, there was an explosion along the pipeline in Alabama that caused=
 a major fire=2E One person was killed and several others were injured=2E Y=
esterday, Alabama's governor declared a state of emergencyto help make sure=
 gas is delivered throughout the state=2EPart of the pipeline's been shut d=
own and now the company that operates it says it 
http://click=2Emorning7=2Etheskimm=2Ecom/?qs=3D13e1958399f01518f1a7a6aa74e5=
4eaee3f22c427c587f46e59947aedc70e2ddbba3242f6bfb8b69 
could take days  to get the whole thing up and running again=2E Sofornow it=
looks like gas prices could be back on the up and up=2E
theSKIMM
A major pipeline that millions of people depend on for gas every day can't =
seem to get off the struggle bus=2E And now this latest incident has fuel c=
ompanies scrambling to stock up on supply=2E Ifit starts costing more to fi=
ll up the tank, this is why=2E

WHAT TO SAYTO YOUR FRIEND WHO GREW UP ON DEEP DISH PIZZA…

In it to win it=2E Last night, the 
http://click=2Emorning7=2Etheskimm=2Ecom/?qs=3D13e1958399f01518eb92f32ee674=
c5ae648f0c76b48d0f861ccc7e253e391b9fc24ffef3c6d321fb 
Chicago Cubs tied up the World Series  by beating the Cleveland Indians in =
Game 6=2E They won 9-3=2E Now all eyes are on Game 7 tonight=2E The Cubs ha=
ven't won the series since 1908=2E The Indians haven't won since 1948=2E So=
 it's not like there's a lot on the line or anything=2E Break out the peanu=
ts=2E

WHAT TO SAY WHEN YOU FIND OUT YOURTWO FRIENDS WHO YOU INTRODUCED ARE GETTIN=
G TOGETHERWITHOUT YOU=2E=2E=2E

What's going on here? Earlier this week, 
http://click=2Emorning7=2Etheskimm=2Ecom/?qs=3D13e1958399f01518335c687702c2=
a91cdae5c278dd891b638aef063583271a5bb0b6836c0953412f 
a federal judge ordered  the Republican party to explain any deals it mayha=
ve made with GOP nominee Donald Trump's campaign to monitor the polls durin=
g this election season=2E Reminder: for months, Trump has been saying this =
election is
http://click=2Emorning7=2Etheskimm=2Ecom/?qs=3D13e1958399f015181282a946ce17=
ef3bccb16f5ee0ab70200fc13d574dfa402946fb8f75a3a9f0f7 
";rigged"; against him, and encouraging his supporters to be on the lookout=
 for voter fraud=2E Early voting opened recently in a lot of states=2E And =
there have been reports of Trump supporters allegedly photographing and 
http://click=2Emorning7=2Etheskimm=2Ecom/?qs=3D13e1958399f015187d61ecd759d7=
b0730c22d96dc27b5bbdf7ca9040c492390b0af040f590c882b5 
harassing  people at the polls=2E That's according to a string of different=
 lawsuits inArizona, Ohio, and Nevada flaggingconcerns that some voters are=
 being intimidated=2E Last week, the Democratic party filed a separate comp=
laint with a federal court=2E Now, the Republican party has until the end o=
f today to turn over any evidence that could be related to collaboratingwit=
h the Trump campaign=2EStay tuned=2E

http://click=2Emorning7=2Etheskimm=2Ecom/?qs=3D13e1958399f01518dc0466271971=
9d7c96a196b6493a840195c679622ee661714c17971d712ff8e3

1180617bc85052596e23d29e50c671041e605e72fc704ed3d004 

WHAT TO SAY TO WHEN YOUR AM TRAIN GETS DELAYED FOR THE FIFTH TIME…

I give up=2E Yesterday, Russia put Syrian peace talks on hold=2E 
http://click=2Emorning7=2Etheskimm=2Ecom/?qs=3D13e1958399f01518f6d20f368728=
eb2eed5d4f06ed7405a177f0acf26b236762f262bfa4aa7f8044 
Indefinitely=2E  For years, Syria has been going through a violent civil wa=
r between Syrian President Bashar al-Assad (backed by Russia) and rebel gro=
ups (some backed by the US) who want him out of power=2E Hundreds of thousa=
nds of people have been killed=2E Millions have been forced to leave home, =
causing the EU's worst migrant and refugee crisis since World War II=2E The=
 two sides have been trying and failing to hash out a peace deal for a whil=
e now=2E Earlier this month, Russia agreed to a 
http://click=2Emorning7=2Etheskimm=2Ecom/?qs=3D13e1958399f0151881e18b7235c5=
73a07dea1d6f66d4e48cd2742d456c53c4803082f69bb0806362 
";humanitarian pause";  to airstrikes in Aleppo - the key rebel stronghold =
where a lot of thefighting has been focused=2E Meanwhile, rebel's have been=

http://click=2Emorning7=2Etheskimm=2Ecom/?qs=3D13e1958399f015189ef9643b4194=
48cc8bcbcc8372e8c961fd45cc9331da20df64ae665f2298570e 
fighting back in the city =2E And today, Russia announced it would give reb=
els 
http://click=2Emorning7=2Etheskimm=2Ecom/?qs=3D13e1958399f01518afb1f76fc2f9=
e26bd6f8888964170d459663fedc1855df664b5efa241f0c9f2b 
even more time  to leave Aleppo=2EBut it's still walking away from the peac=
e table for the foreseeable future=2E So, Syria's still a peace of work=2E
=


Skimm This
http://click=2Emorning7=2Etheskimm=2Ecom/?qs=3D13e1958399f0151842b260af3e1b=
c0d9404642d2e41e7037c150074a140f84985b3132dcecd8d9b8

d84627a4a4c82c3debbbab214d0eab433d4640110ad6d8f2c6e4 

WHAT TO SAY WHEN YOUR DATE SAYS HE NEEDS A NOISE MACHINE ON HIGH VOLUME TO =
FALL ASLEEP=2E=2E=2E

Having second thoughts=2E That's what Gannett is telling Tronc (the artist =
formerly known as Tribune Publishing)=2E For months, Gannett, which owns ab=
out a hundred news outlets including USA Today, has been 
http://click=2Emorning7=2Etheskimm=2Ecom/?qs=3D13e1958399f01518bdef4b851c42=
6335e6df0d77034c6d82d93d562a29526e8f2686412ced239f5f 
trying to buy Tronc , which owns nameslike the LA Times and Chicago Tribune=
=2E For years, print news companies have been struggling to keepad dollars =
and readers on board=2E Gannett was hoping that the power of two media comp=
anies combined would be more attractive than one, especially to advertisers=
=2E The dealwould have created one of the largest media groups in the count=
ry=2E So earlier this year, Gannett saddled up to Tronc with a buyout offer=
 of around $400 million=2E Tronc said 'no, thanks, we're not that cheap=2E'=
 Yesterday, after a lot ofback and forth, Gannett 
http://click=2Emorning7=2Etheskimm=2Ecom/?qs=3D13e1958399f01518d2bffab0c234=
f17b032b9701c23e88c1cd13f48f1fdc3ceff250bcb5f1df018d 
walked away from the deal=2E  This mightalso be because Gannett had 'meh' e=
arnings last quarter, meaning they couldn't get the cash together to write =
the check=2E Either way, both companies are still single AF=2E

Skimm for November 2nd
Skimm’d w= hile getting up on what’s at stake in 2016=2E Ready to vote?<= /a> 
QUOTE OF THE DAY

“Moisture harveste= d from the clouds” - A description of how Sky PA, a new Scottish beer, is ma= de=2E Cloudy with a chance of hipster=2E
Skimm This

GAS PAINS

=
=

THE STORY

Earlier this week, a major oil pipeline that runs thro= ugh Alabama exploded=2E

WAIT…BACK UP=2E

The Colonial Pipeline is a system of pipes thousands o= f miles long that carries millions of barrels of gas, diesel, and jet fuel = a day from Texas to New Jersey=2E It supplies about a third of the Eas= t Coast’s gas=2E So it’s a BF gassy D=2E But the pipeline’= ;s run into some problems lately=2E Earlier this fall, part of it was shut down f= or over a week after a leak in Alabama spilled hundreds of thousands of gal= lons of gas=2E Cue a gas shortage and prices in southern states going up, up, up= =2E

SO WHAT’S THE LATEST?

On Monday, there was an explosion along the pipeline i= n Alabama that caused a major fire=2E One person was killed and several oth= ers were injured=2E Yesterday, Alabama’s governor declared a state of= emergency to help make sure gas is de= livered throughout the state=2E Part of the pipeline’s be= en shut down and now the company that operates it says it could take days to get= the whole thing up and running again=2E So for now it looks= like gas prices could be back on the up and up=2E

theSKIMM

A major pipeline that millions of people depend on for= gas every day can’t seem to get off the struggle bus=2E And now this= latest incident has fuel companies scrambling to stock up on supply=2E If&= #160;it starts costing more to fill up the tank, this is why=2E
Skimm This

REPEAT AFTER ME=2E=2E=2E

=

WHAT TO SAY TO = YOUR FRIEND WHO GREW UP ON DEEP DISH PIZZA…

In it to win it=2E Las= t night, the Chicago Cubs tied up the World Series by beating the Cleveland Indian= s in Game 6=2E They won 9-3=2E Now all eyes are on Game 7 tonight=2E The Cu= bs haven’t won the series since 1908=2E The Indians haven’t won= since 1948=2E So it’s not like there’s a lot on the line or an= ything=2E Break out the peanuts=2E
Skimm This

WHAT TO SAY WHEN YOU= FIND OUT YOUR TWO FRIENDS WHO YOU INTRODUCED ARE GETTING TOGETHER= 0;WITHOUT YOU=2E=2E=2E

What’s going on = here? Earlier this week, a federal judge ordered the Republican party to explain a= ny deals it may have made with GOP nominee Donald Trump’s campai= gn to monitor the polls during this election season=2E Reminder: for months= , Trump has been saying this election is “rigged” against hi= m, and encouraging his supporters to be on the lookout for voter fraud=2E E= arly voting opened recently in a lot of states=2E And there have been repor= ts of Trump supporters allegedly photographing and harassing people at the polls= =2E That’s according to a string of different lawsuits in Arizon= a, Ohio, and Nevada flagging concerns that some voters are being intim= idated=2E Last week, the Democratic party filed a separate complaint with a= federal court=2E Now, the Republican party has until the end of today to t= urn over any evidence that could be related to collaborating with the = Trump campaign=2E Stay tuned=2E
Skimm This

WHAT TO SAY TO WHEN = YOUR AM TRAIN GETS DELAYED FOR THE FIFTH TIME…

I give up=2E Yesterday= , Russia put Syrian peace talks on hold=2E Indefinitely=2E For years, Syria has be= en going through a violent civil war between Syrian President Bashar al-Ass= ad (backed by Russia) and rebel groups (some backed by the US) who want him= out of power=2E Hundreds of thousands of people have been killed=2E Millio= ns have been forced to leave home, causing the EU’s worst migrant and= refugee crisis since World War II=2E The two sides have been trying and fa= iling to hash out a peace deal for a while now=2E Earlier this month, Russi= a agreed to a “humanitarian pause” to airstrikes in Aleppo - the key r= ebel stronghold where a lot of the fighting has been focused=2E Meanwh= ile, rebel’s have been fighting back in the city=2E And today, Russia a= nnounced it would give rebels even more time to leave Aleppo=2E But it’= s still walking away from the peace table for the foreseeable future=2E So,= Syria’s still a peace of work=2E
Skimm This

WHAT TO SAY WHEN YOU= R DATE SAYS HE NEEDS A NOISE MACHINE ON HIGH VOLUME TO FALL ASLEEP=2E=2E=2E=

Having second thoughts= =2E That’s what Gannett is telling Tronc (the artist formerly known a= s Tribune Publishing)=2E For months, Gannett, which owns about a hundred ne= ws outlets including USA Today, has been trying to buy Tronc, which owns names= 0;like the LA Times and Chicago Tribune=2E For years, print news companies = have been struggling to keep ad dollars and readers on board=2E Gannet= t was hoping that the power of two media companies combined would be more a= ttractive than one, especially to advertisers=2E The deal would have c= reated one of the largest media groups in the country=2E So earlier this ye= ar, Gannett saddled up to Tronc with a buyout offer of around $400 million= =2E Tronc said ‘no, thanks, we’re not that cheap=2E’ Yest= erday, after a lot of back and forth, Gannett walked away from the deal=2E Th= is might also be because Gannett had ‘meh’ earnings last q= uarter, meaning they couldn’t get the cash together to write the chec= k=2E Either way, both companies are still single AF=2E
Skimm This

WHAT TO SAY = TO YOUR FRIEND WHO ONLY DOES SQUATS AT THE GYM =2E=2E=2E

Say goodbye to your fave emoji=2E=

Skimm This
=

SKIMM THE VOTE

In case you somehow missed it, yo= u have to vote on Tuesday=2E Catch up on who̵= 7;s on your ballot and what’s at stake=2E Then plan your trip to the = polls=2E Questions, answered=2E
